I typically don't bring my studies on here in terms of current events. But I'm saying it now, in the event of a successful invasion and seizure of Ukraine by Russia. Two things. The U.S. led unipolar world order is over. And China will move to invade Taiwan within the next year.

No one should play down Putin's actions here. This invasion is a violation of international law, and will probably be a human rights horror-show. At the same time, let's not pretend US refusal to negotiate over Russian proposals + Ukraine's rejection of Minsk played no role.

The media, to go along with GOP, have no problem calling the souther border migration an illegal immigrant "invasion". When a real invasion of a country occurs, an actual occupation/takeover, the media goes along with Putin's use of "peacekeepers" crossing into Ukraine.
